law.text: If, in the referendum called under the provisions of KRS 247.6001 to 247.6035, a majority of the eligible producers, who vote therein, shall vote in the affirmative and in favor of the levying and collection of the assessment proposed in the referendum, the assessment shall be collected in the manner determined and announced by the association conducting the referendum.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 223, sec. 12, effective July 13, 1990.
